ComicInfo.Summary:
Gasoline Valley!: Where the question of "will Caulky ever grow" is answered.
Pot-Shot Pete Sheriff of Yucca-pucca Gulch!: Pot-Shot tries to halt arms sales to the Apaches.
Wild 1/2: Johnny and his gang give up motorcycles.
Captain Tvideo!: A parody of the Captain Video television program.
